blog.description: Mariah. 22. CisFemale. Multifandom/Personal. Yoosung Kim, Mamoru Kishi, and Castiel have joint custody of my heart.

summary:
soooooooo, if I were to create bnha oc's despite never watching the show..... It thought of the idea of like a duo. 
One of...
body:
soooooooo, if I were to create bnha oc’s despite never watching the show….. It thought of the idea of like a duo.

One of them, probably the like main one, has a hellhound quirk, she can turn fully into a big ass hell hound but also has partially transformed states. The issue and biggest limitation is though, that when she’s full hell hound beast mode, she can’t control herself. Her brain basically goes feral , the hellhound will rage until it completely exhausts it’s energy and passes out. This isn’t great for a hero, cause yeah she can save people during partial transformation forms, but if she’s backed into a corner/high stress/high anger, she’ll fully shift and the hellhound gives zero fucks if you’re a villain, hero, or civilian, it’s just a wild animal.

The second and her partner has the power to like puppet manipulate living beings. But, they can only do one at a time, it has limitations of she herself is kinda physically weak, if her hands are incapacitated she canT use her quirk. So, she’s kind of a squishy wizard in that aspect. So, you probably see where this is going. This character kinda becomes the first one’s tamer, she uses her powers to control the hellhound and guide it’s actions. It gives her a giant wall of defense and prevents the hellhound oc from killing innocent people/allies.

tags: apparently a real person according to apple
summary:
There is only one thing identified as a person in all 1,491 of the photos on my phone.
And it’s my old Discord icon. What’s more...
body:
There is only one thing identified as a person in all 1,491 of the photos on my phone.

And it’s my old Discord icon. What’s more is that it sees almost every picture with Kaminari making a similar face (including all pictures where that icon is visible) as the same “person.”

My phone knows what’s up.

summary: In the Age of the Social
title: In the Age of the Social
description:
by singingdevil

““I feel like shit and I want it to stop,” Bakugou croaks, tone detached and emotionless.

“Okay,” Aizawa replies, even though that did not answer his question. But Bakugou is clearly not lying, either.”

In which Bakugou has a very shitty morning and Aizawa fills his role as his class’s unofficial father figure.

Words: 2931, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

title: Hero Training
description:
by WormDaddy (ToxicSugar)

Class 1-A is having a week of special training with non-offensive quirks. However, Bakugou gets hit with an unusual quirk that Kirishima tries to help him resolve. Kirishima finds things out about Bakugou that nobody else knows, and they fail at trying to keep their relationship a secret.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Come Back Toe Me
description:
by Milligramme

Kirishima comes home to Bakugou after a long day at work. He’s finally safe and sound, nothing can hurt him here… except the furniture, apparently.

When Bakugou finds Kirishima laughing like an idiot after hurting himself, he’s torn between laughing with his stupid partner or worrying about him.

Words: 3817, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Established Relationship, Aged-Up Character(s), Post-Canon, Alternate Universe - Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia), Fluff and Angst, Laughing Together, Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Domestic Disaster, this was supposed to be all cute and funny and then angst invited itself…, I suppose the choice of POV is responsible but I have no regret

reblog.comment:

When Bakugou finds Kirishima laughing like an idiot after hurting himself, he’s torn between laughing with his stupid partner or worrying about him.

body:
Bakugou: Everyone has called me “Kacchan” all day. I think Deku paid them to do it.

Midoriya: Yes. Five bucks each and it was totally worth it.
